rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb explicitly paired with significant scale or impact.
This reports details of procurement without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a planned action/procurement ('will be jointly procured') without active reassurance.
